original_text: So the people brought the boy to Jesus. When the bad spirit saw Jesus, it immediately caused the boy's body to shake strongly. The boy fell onto the ground and he rolled about. Water was coming from his mouth.
korean_text: 이에 데리고 오니 귀신이 예수를 보고 곧 그 아이로 심히 경련을 일으키게 하는지라 그가 땅에 엎드러져 구르며 거품을 흘리더라

sentences.original_text: So the people brought the boy to Jesus
When the bad spirit saw Jesus
it immediately caused the boy's body to shake strongly
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 즉시 소년의 몸을 세게 떨게 했다

sentences.original_text: The boy fell onto the ground
Water was coming from his mouth
